ygData.subject: Re: WANT EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: It works fairly well with dial up. I myself use dial up. My standard connection speed is 26400 and I really only have problems in the bazaar which has hundreds
ygData.messageBody:
It works fairly well with dial up. I myself use dial up. My standard
connection speed is 26400 and I really only have problems in the
bazaar which has hundreds of players in it.
Of course a faster system will help. My old box is a p3 450 with
512ram and a 64m vid card. It very playable with those specs. My new
box is a p4 2.2 with 512 ram and a 128 vid card. I have very little
lag in the bazaar with it using the same settings and dial up.

Timmye Cousteau
37 Druid of Karana on The Rathe

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., "BADBRAD112" <badbrad112@y...> wrote:
> Hi everyone, i just wanted to ask some questions. Does this game
work well at all using dail up, cause thats all i got right now and i
was wonering if i am gonna need to upgrade to cable internet to play
this game, if any of you out there use dail up, does it run fast or
what?
>
> thanks
